title: New skin updates
body:
The Frost Fire annie skin update makes her look like a toal loli all those lolicons who play league must be going crazy
{{champion:1}}

replies.body:
[](http://(http://i.imgur.com/kPeXhFg.jpg))

That is not a loli, Look up ro kyu bu if you want to see a loli (even the goddam teacher is a loli in this show, literally his mother is the only normal woman in the show), or oni chichi.  Definitely check out oni chichi.
